data.text: @EjoWVgirl @NBCNightlyNews It's refusing to serve [a class of people] vs [reacting to an individual]. It's basically the difference between prejudice vs. judgement.
@NBCNightlyNews There is no excuse for discrimination in any form. Refusing service based on whatever beliefs you wanna cite is discrimination plain and simple.
@EjoWVgirl @NBCNightlyNews It's not.  But Sanders didn't demand service.  She just left instead of suing them.  See the difference?
@han_solo1977 @NBCNightlyNews Not an accurate comparison.  No one is taking the Red Hen to court.
@NBCNightlyNews How is being allowed to not make a wedding cake or provide flowers for gay wedding different from refusing food service to someone you completely disagree with on a moral issue?

@NBCNightlyNews @PeteWilliamsNBC Let her prove that the sale of  flowers to a gay couple is a violation of her  religious beliefs.she claims it affects her relationship with Jesus. question does she talk to Jesus? Please tell me does he answer her? Very strange.
@NBCNightlyNews Yep, then the party of Drumpf  will cry like no other when they get denied from a restaurant.
@NBCNightlyNews Here we go... all those equal rights are going to be stripped away.
